mapper.update: UPDATE room SET last_message = #{lastMessage}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id as roomId, r.room_type as roomType, r.name as roomName, r.last_message as lastMessage, r.updated_at as updatedAt, rp.last_read_chat_id as lastReadChatId, (SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM chat c WHERE c.room_id = r.room_id AND c.chat_id > COALESCE(rp.last_read_chat_id, 0) AND c.send_user_id != #{userId}) THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat c WHERE c.room_id = r.room_id AND c.chat_id > COALESCE(rp.last_read_chat_id, 0) AND c.send_user_id != #{userId}) ELSE 0 END) as notReadCount FROM room r JOIN room_participants rp ON r.room_id = rp.room_id WHERE rp.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.updated_at DESC
SELECT room_id as roomId, room_type as roomType, name, last_message as lastMessage, updated_at as updatedAt FROM room WHERE room_id = #{roomId}

SELECT r.room_id FROM room r JOIN room_participants rp1 ON r.room_id = rp1.room_id JOIN room_participants rp2 ON r.room_id = rp2.room_id WHERE r.room_type = 'ONE_TO_ONE' AND rp1.user_id = #{userId1} AND rp2.user_id = #{userId2} LIMIT 1
